summary: MY 2001 FORD EXCAPE HAS 27,600 MILES ON IT.  MY TIRES HAVE WORN OUT FROM THE OUTSIDE IN.  I CARRIED IT TO THE LOCAL FORD DEALER AND WAS TOLD I NEEDED A 4 WHEEL ALIGNMENT.  MY DEALER SAID I HAD RECEIVED A CHECK BEFORE I BOUGHT IT.  I DID NOT.  I DROVE IT OFF THE SHOWROOM FLOOR.  NOW I HAVE TO BUY OVER $400 WORTH OF TIRES AND HAVE AN ALIGNMENT.  THE LOCAL DEALER SAID I WOULD HAVE TO HAVE HAD A PRETTY GOOD LICK FOR IT TO HAVE ALL 4 OUT OF ALIGNMENT.  I DO NOT HOTDOG THIS CAR.  I FEEL LIKE THIS IS A MANUFACTURERS DEFECT
